title: Cannot assign int64 to interface{}
body:
1. What is a short input program that triggers the error?

package main

var a interface{}

func main() {
	a = 1000000000000
}

2. What is the full compiler output?

main.go:6: constant 1000000000000 overflows int

3. What version of the compiler are you using?  (Run it with the -V flag.)
6g version weekly.2011-12-02 10679+
